column1: It gave him pleasure to keep things, as he said, " shipshape and Bristol fashion ".

column1: These next few pages are the reactions of one who went to the Centre, came away evangelical and kept saying to himself, ‘ All shipshape and Bristol fashion’, only to fall from the crest into the deepest trough, but thankfully to climb up again to a sensible plateau and finally discover that he had been fortified in more ways than he had expected.
